title: Is there a way to trace the differences of a software in x64dbg?
content: Why does Immunity Debugger unable to start my application? I want to compare the differences of a software: Immunity Debugger can trace all assembly instruction with the Add entries of all procedures option ( Run trace --> Add entries of all procedures ) and saves it to *.txt file ( Run trace --> Log to file ). I want to know if I can do the same in x64dbg?
